Name: 24世纪后
About the game: After the 24th century, the Japanese-style pixel PRG adventure game, players explore the world in the game, the ultimate exciting action challenge, agile skills and leisurely movement to eliminate Endless boss, in this era of destruction of human civilization, technological mistakes have caused human scientific civilization to slowly regress, exploring the ruins allows players to go Different ruins, explore what happened before civilization went extinct. [Game Features] 1, 1, pixel-style RPG adventure game, the game is based on an experienced wasteland world, players can freely take risks and explore the unknown in this game world. 2. In a barren world, human beings are lingering on the wasteland. As the peak of human science and technology development in the 21st century, they have suffered a devastating blow that is almost extinct. Become a wasteland. 3. Mistakes in technology have almost brought mankind back to the Stone Age. You can build weapons, capture animals, explore ruins, towers in the sky, what?! This is the legend The weapon? [Game style] 1. Retro
